summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2624, for the improvement of Jackson Street, from 21st Avenue South to 23rd Avenue South, by regrading, construction of wooden walks, curbs and gutters, planking; by constructing all sewers, side sewers and watermains with their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage water service and fire protection of said district; the reconstruction of all cluster light system necessary.
